projects.description: Show a new quote on the page each time the user clicks the "Show Another Quote" button
Use unobtrusive javascript to modify the HTML and paginate the list of students on a page.

use JavaScript to enhance an interactive registration form for a fictional conference called "FullStack Conf". Add customized and conditional behavior and interactivity. Validates user input and providing helpful error messages when the user enters invalid information into the form fields.

Create a browser-based, word guessing game: "Phrase Hunter." Use JavaScript and OOP (Object-Oriented Programming) to select a random, hidden phrase. A player tries to guess the phrase by selecting individual letters from an onscreen keyboard.
Display an employee directory page from users requested from a random user generator API
